action.msg: So, there a reason why we're in the shady part of town?
I mean the SHADIER part of town.
Actually every part in town is kinda shady-
We've been getting strange complaints.
Supposively, there's been word of a "monster" lurking in some of the decret...
Decrent... uh... Decrept...
I think the word you're looking for is "decrepit."
Yeah that! The "decrepent" buildings on this side of town.
This part of town hasn't been renovated like the others, so it's still a bit... dusty.
Luckily, there's no such things as monsters, so I'm guessing it's just some silly rumor created by the kids on the playground!
You... do realize that I'm from space, right?
And... you yourself are a demon. In fact, last week we had an encounter with a shapeshifter.
Your point?
Ugh, nevermind. Let's just get this over with. You sure this the right building
I can't say for sure. Every building on this side of town looks the goddamn same. Is there a light switch?
Can't you summon some cool demon fire magic or something?
The only fire I can summon is from my love for you.
I dunno... probably not as hot as actual fire...
I can prove it.
Here we go.
Did someone say fire?
HUH? It's-
Oh, it's just some kid.
Or, a cat. A kid cat..
Uh, hey. You uh, live here?
Maybe I do. Why, you here to kick me out?
Nah, that's not my job. My job is to just beat up people if need be and kick them out of town.
...oh wait, that kind of is my job.
Uh, I also respond to challenges for my title.
Proud of you babe.
Hey, don't I know you?
Oh, shit- Tea? I was wondering if you were actually in this town or not.
Huh? You know the cat?
Yeah, Wee and I used to hang out whenever I visited the space hubs.
If I remember correctly, that was a LONG time ago.
Space hubs? That's like the space customs right?
(Fuck, I hope he doesn't recognize my face...)
So you're the guy dating Tea?
You seem okay.
Uh, cool.
Well, if I were to guess, whoever made the report must've mistaken Wee for a monster or something.
Makes sense, I thought Tea was a monster when we first met in town.
A monster? Oh yeah, I think I've seen something like that around. They're cool. I think.
But uh, yo, that a microphone?
Hm. I already see where this is going.
I dunno... I'm kind of on a schedule here...
Afraid that I'm gonna destroy you in front of your girl?
Oh nah- now you've said too much!
I'm about to send you back to the pound! Come on Tea, let's show him how strong my flow is!
